hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime Compression Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes (61.5% confidence), when BTC trades within a 5-day Bollinger Band width compression (<15% of 20-day average) and breaks above the 20-day high with volume >1.5x 20-day average, the breakout will sustain for 3+ days with minimal retracement below breakout level.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often precede directional moves after compression. Low volatility + high volume breakout suggests institutional accumulation. Recent market stress (Hedera lows, market plunge) creates coiled spring potential.
entry_conditions: BTC 5-day BB width < 15% of 20-day average BB width
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% above breakout level OR 3 days holding above breakout
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Close below breakout level on 4H candle
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: >50% of breakouts retrace below entry within 24H OR volume confirmation fails to predict sustainability (R² < 0.3 on 3-day forward returns)
